title: Warm Hearts Dhaka
description: Providing warm clothes to vulnerable families in Dhaka city slums.

title: Blanket Drive Chattogram
description: Distributing blankets to underprivileged communities in Chattogram hill tracts.

title: Rajshahi Winter Relief
description: A campaign focused on providing winter essentials to the elderly in Rajshahi.

title: Sylhet Cozy Drive
description: Donating warm clothes to tea garden workers and their families in Sylhet.

title: Khulna Warmth Mission
description: Helping fishermen and their families in Khulna to stay warm during the winter.

title: Mymensingh Care Initiative
description: Reaching out to low-income communities in Mymensingh with winter clothing.

title: Barishal Blanket Drive
description: Helping underprivileged school children in Barishal with warm clothing.

title: Rangpur Winter Aid
description: Distributing blankets and sweaters in the coldest parts of Rangpur.

title: Cumilla Warmth Drive
description: Focusing on providing winter relief to low-income families in Cumilla.

title: Dhaka Blanket Hub
description: A major campaign targeting urban poor in the outskirts of Dhaka.

title: Jashore Warmth Initiative
description: Supporting orphanages in Jashore with winter essentials.

title: Dinajpur Cozy Care
description: Providing jackets and sweaters to low-income farmers in Dinajpur.
